## isNumber() function

判断是否是数字，不包括NaN、INFINITY

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isNumber(n: any): n is number;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | any |  |

**Returns:**

n is number
